products.title: Day & Night Effortless Red
products.productdescription: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work.

products.title: Bayham, Red - Vista Blind
products.metadescription: Bayham, red - vista blind add a modern touch to your home with the striking and elegant bayham red. With the light dancing its way through the delicately woven voile panels you will be able to create the perfect ambience to suit the occasion by titling th
products.productdescription: Add a modern touch to your home with the striking and elegant bayham red. With the light dancing its way through the delicately woven voile panels you will be able to create the perfect ambience to suit the occasion by titling the flowing red fabric any way you please. Perfect for bringing a contemporary style into any room in the house.Use red in rooms where you want to bring something a little different to the table. Add a splash of colour to the conservatory or make a feature of the window in the guest bedroom. The options are endless and the choice is yours!
